terms.heading: Before you start
terms.description: Form Interpreter 2.0 works fully anonymously and does not store personal data on the server. You still need to accept the terms of use before using the service.

terms.title: Terms of use
terms.body:
This service is under active development. Use it at your own discretion.

The service does not store personal data on the server. However, do not type any highly sensitive information that you would not want to share.

privacy.title: Privacy notice
privacy.body:
Form Interpreter 2.0 does not store personal data on the server.

Technical log data may be collected for monitoring and statistics in a way that does not identify individual users.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.body:
Our goal is WCAG 2.1 AA level accessibility.

If you notice barriers when using the service, please inform Digiter so we can improve the service.
